title: If you had to live as a food which one would you live as and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Live as a food? So I would eventually be eaten? Well than I am already food for any number of predators that could kill me, if I was in their habitat and without all the accouterments of civilization. Also, I currently feed hundreds if not thousands of bacteria and parasites in my body and when I die, I will be eaten by billions of bacteria. So I am already food and I will continue to live as I am, thank you very much!
